title: Field-responsive grain boundary against dendrite penetration for all-solid-state batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6707-6716
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02853H, Paper
Bing-Qing Xiong, Xiaoye Liu, Qingshun Nian, Zihong Wang, Yuhong Zhu, Xuan Luo, Jinyu Jiang, Digen Ruan, Jun Ma, Junhao Jiang, Yi-Feng Cheng, Changhao Li, Xiaodi Ren
Ferroelectric BaTiO3 improves all-solid-state Li metal batteries with garnet-based solid electrolytes by reducing electric fields at grain boundary, preventing Li filament growth, and forming mixed-conducting interlayers.
